meanings.definition: The distinctive taste or smell of a food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The flavors of the soup were rich and savory.
meanings.sent2: I love the flavors of ice cream, especially chocolate and vanilla.
meanings.sent3: The flavors of the cake danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume carried the flavors of spring flowers.
meanings.sent5: The flavors of the barbecue were so delicious, they lingered in my memory.

meanings.definition: A substance used to give a particular taste to food or drink.
meanings.sent1: She added different flavors to the stew to enhance its taste.
meanings.sent2: The chef used various flavors to create a unique dish.
meanings.sent3: The flavors of the seasoning blended perfectly in the sauce.
meanings.sent4: His words had the flavors of bitterness and regret.
meanings.sent5: The flavors of the spices transformed the bland dish into a culinary masterpiece.
